Mr. ASOKA LAXMAN HETTIARACHCHY – It is with deep sadness that we announce the passing of Mr. Asoka Laxman Hettiarachchy (Retired DGM – People’s Bank). Beloved husband of the late Indrani,​ cherished father of Renuka and Yasas,​ and respected father-in-law of Clifford. He was also a loving brother to Padmini,​ Chandrani,​ Rangith,​ Ananda,​ Indrani,​ and Keerthi. Laxman was a dear brother-in-law to the late W H B Dassanayake,​ the late Tilak Karunaratne,​ Neetha,​ Yamuna,​ Hemawardane,​ and Thilani. His presence will be deeply missed by all who knew him,​ and his memory will forever remain in our hearts. The cremation ceremony will be held at the public cemetery in Rawathawatte on 27th at 5 p.m. 14/​3,​ Laxapathiya Road,​ Moratuwa.
